brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of AXOS on parameters of colon
      metabolism and gut health

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of AXOS on the Colon Metabolism in Healthy Volunteers

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  healthy volunteers

          -  regular dietary pattern (3 meals/day)

          -  age: 18-45y

          -  BMI: 18,5-27 kg/m2

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  intake of antibiotics 1 month prior to the study

          -  abdominal surgery in the past, with the exception of appendectomy

          -  intake of medication influencing the gastro-intestinal system 14 days prior to the
             study

          -  in treatment at a dietician

          -  serious liver- or kidney failure

          -  vegetarians

          -  intake of pre- and/or probiotics

          -  Exposure to radioactivity 1 year prior to the study

clinical_study.official_title: Effect of AXOS on the Colon Metabolism in Healthy Volunteers

authority: Belgium: Federal Agency for Medicinal Products and Health Products

primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants are followed for 10 weeks, with measurements on 4 specific time points

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Investigator), Primary Purpose: Basic Science
